pkgmetadata.longdescription: Easily download any available Periscope stream by simply giving Pyriscope the URL.Pyriscope automatically downloads and stitches together Periscope video chunks.Optionally, Pyriscope converts the downloaded .ts file to a .mp4 file with optional rotation. (Requires ffmpeg)Usage: pyriscope <urls> [options]See 'pyriscope --help' for further details.
